amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit the use of funds to finalize, implement, or enforce rulemaking pertaining to energy conservation standards for consumer water heaters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
